title: Bound by Flame [SEYTER]
description:
Released: 2014
Genre: RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Spiders
Publisher: Focus Home Interactive
Language: Russian | English
Language: English
Tablet: Enclosing (CODEX)
Short description: Bound by Flame - role-playing game with action fights, action which takes place in a dark fantasy world where the player assumes the role of a mercenary, a fiery demon possessed. Initially available hero killer skills and the art of magic fire, then the character can develop skills in three branches. System also provides complete customization of appearance, including detailed configuration of the face. 
As events unfold, the player has the ability to take additional demonic forces, or abandon them, that will have a direct impact on both the appearance of the hero, and the game world. In conjunction with the decisions it leads to changes in the events of each chapter of history. 
At Bound by Flame also implemented crafting system, and considerable help in the adventures become allies. Which of the characters join the hero, depending directly on his actions - the player is allowed to develop friendship, love, and make enemies.
